Event Schedule: 1/7/2025 - 1/21/2025 

 

* Per-Character Event

 

[b]Complete Royal Castle Topaz Hall - False Confession raids to obtain the Lucky Sprint buff.[/b]
[list][*]There's a total of 5 stages of Lucky Sprint buff, and the stage will increase by 1 every time a raid is completed.[list][*]Once the event starts, the Sprint buff will reset every day at 7 AM UTC.[/*][/list][/*][/list]
